text: Bound is a 1996 American romantic crime thriller starring Jennifer Tilly and Gina Gershon as two bisexual women who plot to steal $2 million in Mafia money. Bound received positive reviews from critics who praised its humor and strong style and its portrayal of lesbian relationships in any mainstream motion picture. It was rated R in the United States and Australia for sexual content and intense violence. It was released October 4, 1996 in the United States. == Other websites == * Category:1996 romance movies Category:1996 crime thriller movies Category:1990s erotic movies Category:1996 LGBT movies Category:American crime thriller movies Category:American erotic movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:1990s American romance movies Category:1990s English-language movies Category:Film noir Category:LGBT crime movies Category:LGBT erotic movies Category:LGBT romance movies Category:LGBT thriller movies Category:Movies about murderers Category:American independent movies Category:1996 independent movies Category:Movies directed by The Wachowskis
title: Bound (movie)
